meta.description: Determine the production plan for a toy company to maximize profit given labor, inspection, and demand constraints.

params.name: labor_hours
params.description: Labor hours required per unit of each product

params.name: inspection_hours
params.description: Inspection hours required per unit of each product

params.name: profit
params.description: Profit per unit of each product

vars.name: production
vars.description: Number of units to produce for each product

objective.name: max_profit
objective.expr: sum(profit[p] * production[p] for p in PRODUCTS)
objective.description: Maximize total profit from all products

constraints.name: labor_capacity_constraint
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(labor_hours[p] * production[p] for p in PRODUCTS)
constraints.description: Total labor hours used cannot exceed available labor hours

constraints.name: inspection_capacity_constraint
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(inspection_hours[p] * production[p] for p in PRODUCTS)
constraints.description: Total inspection hours used cannot exceed available inspection hours

constraints.name: demand_constraint_advanced
constraints.description: Production of advanced type cannot exceed its demand

constraints.name: demand_constraint_intermediate
constraints.description: Production of intermediate type cannot exceed its demand

constraints.name: demand_constraint_basic
constraints.description: Production of basic type cannot exceed its demand
